00028 from PyQt4.QtCore import *
00029 from PyQt4.QtGui import *
00030 from PyQt4.uic import *
00031 import re
00032 from Koo.Common import Common
00033 from Koo.Common import Options
00034 from Koo import Rpc
00035 
00036 # Searches the list of available databases in the server
00037 def refreshDatabaseList(db_widget, url, dbtoload=None):
00038         if not dbtoload:
00039                 dbtoload = Options.options['login.db']
00040         index = 0
00041         db_widget.clear()
00042                 
00043         result = Rpc.database.list(url)
00044         if result == -1:
00045                 return -1
00046         if result:
00047                 for db_num, db_name in enumerate(result):
00048                         db_widget.addItem( db_name )
00049                         if db_name == dbtoload:
00050                                 index = db_num
00051         db_widget.setCurrentIndex(index)
00052         return db_widget.count()
00053 
00054 (ServerConfigurationDialogUi, ServerConfigurationDialogBase) = loadUiType( Common.uiPath('change_server.ui') )
00055 
00056 class ServerConfigurationDialog( QDialog, ServerConfigurationDialogUi ):
00057         url = ''
00058 
00059         def __init__(self, parent=None):
00060                 QDialog.__init__(self, parent)
00061                 ServerConfigurationDialogUi.__init__(self)
00062                 self.setupUi(self)
00063 
00064                 self.uiConnection.addItem( _("NET-RPC (faster)"), QVariant( 'socket://' ) )
00065                 self.uiConnection.addItem( _("XML-RPC"), QVariant( 'http://' ) )
00066                 self.uiConnection.addItem( _("Secure XML-RPC"), QVariant( 'https://' ) )
00067                 self.uiConnection.addItem( _("Pyro"), QVariant( 'PYROLOC://' ) )
00068                 result = False
00069                 self.connect(self.pushCancel,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.reject )
00070                 self.connect(self.pushAccept,SIGNAL("clicked()"),self.slotAccept )
00071 
00072         def setDefault( self, url ):
00073                 self.url = url
00074                 m = re.match('^(http[s]?://|socket://|PYROLOC://)([\w.\-]+):(\d{1,5})$', url )
00075                 if m:
00076                         self.uiConnection.setCurrentIndex( self.uiConnection.findData( QVariant( m.group(1) ) ) )
00077                         self.uiServer.setText( m.group(2) )
00078                         self.uiPort.setText( m.group(3) )
00079 
00080         def slotAccept(self):
00081                 protocol = unicode( self.uiConnection.itemData( self.uiConnection.currentIndex() ).toString() )
00082                 self.url = '%s%s:%s' % (protocol, self.uiServer.text(), self.uiPort.text())
00083                 self.accept()
